Peter and John offered the beggar an opportunity to be a witness.
Peter and John offered the beggar a sense of worth by doing which of the following?
We are to help people correct ____________.
A priestly orientation includes which of the following?

quizzes.quiz_title: BCOU 405: Pain and Suffering: Helping People in a Broken World

possible_answers.answer_text: a) When he/she wants to hear it
c) What he/she is going to do after hearing the letter
b) Where he/she wants to hear it

questions.question_text: The betrayed spouse should choose which of the following regarding the letter that his/her partner has wrote about the affair?

possible_answers.answer_text: a) Letting the couple know that you will help them work through their old marriage that became contaminated by the affair.
b) Helping lower the startle response that is apparent in the betrayed spouse.

questions.question_text: The goals of the first session with a couple include which of the following?
The development of a Class 2 Affair is ___________.
All adulteries are the same.
The couple should receive homework assignments every week.

possible_answers.answer_text: a) The result of the betrayed spouse’s negativity.
c) Often focused on a marital void.
b) Not the result of a marital issue.
d) Characterized by very intense emotional involvement.

questions.question_text: A Class 3 Affair is _______________.
The betrayed spouse has the right to know anything and everything he/she wants to know about the affair. There are no restrictions.
The unfaithful partner must commit to having no contact with the person that he/she had the affair with for ___ days.
To the degree that the betrayed spouse is able to forgive he/she can start building _________.

possible_answers.answer_text: a) Blow him/her off and give up on rebuilding trust in the relationship
b) Think about it, pray about it, and get back to the partner on it within the following 48 hours
d) Any of the above works depending on the couple

questions.question_text: What should the spouse who has the affair do if he/she cannot recall a piece of information that his/her partner is asking about?

quizzes.quiz_title: BCOU 404: Infidelity: Stabilizing After the Affair

possible_answers.answer_text: a) No one will take care of my needs but me
c) No one will love me as I am
b) I am a bad and worthless person

questions.question_text: Which of the following is a core belief of sex addicts?

possible_answers.answer_text: a) Serves as medication for pain
c) Includes a decrease of sexual activity over time

questions.question_text: Which of the following is NOT part of Dr. Laaser’s definition of sexual addiction?
“I do not understand what I do. For what I want to do I do not do, but what I hate I do.” This statement by the Apostle Paul illustrates what aspect of sex addiction?
Which dimension lies at the core of Healthy Sexuality (according to Dr. Laaser’s model) and must be especially addressed when working with an addict?

possible_answers.answer_text: a) Do you want to get well?
c) What have you done wrong?
b) What are you really thirsty for?
d) What would you die for?

questions.question_text: In the Spiritual Dimension, Dr. Laaser gives three important questions to explore with a client. Which of the following is NOT one of these questions?
Sexual addiction often starts as a way of comforting, nurturing, calming, and soothing oneself.
The Sexual Addiction Cycle begins with which of the following?

Through repetitive sin, we lay down wiring in our brain that keeps us locked in the bonds of addiction. Once in place, brain neuro-chemistry is permanent for the rest of our lives and cannot be changed.
Full disclosure with one’s spouse about sexual sin has been found to be the most destructive factor to trust-building.

possible_answers.answer_text: a) Any behavior that an addict uses to set up acting out
b) The addict’s thought life and cognitive distortions (minimization, excuses, etc.)

questions.question_text: The “Ritual” Stage of the Sex Addiction Cycle includes:

quizzes.quiz_title: BCOU 406: Breaking the Bonds of Sexual Addiction

questions.question_text: Dream sleep is also known as Rapid Eye Movement or REM sleep.
Which of the following is a cause of modern day stress?

possible_answers.answer_text: a) Nothing to be concerned about
d) More common for those who get 8+ hours of sleep each night

questions.question_text: According to Dr. Hart, stress is _____________.
Stress is the nonspecific response of the body to only a few demands.
According to Dr. Hart, even “normal” stress is damaging.
Which of the following is a function of catecholamines?
Panic Anxiety is the ________ mental health problem for women in the United States.
Which of the following is an effect of elevated adrenaline?
__________ is God’s antidote for stress.

possible_answers.answer_text: b) Improved quality and duration of sleep

questions.question_text: Which of the following enhances the brain’s natural tranquilizers?

quizzes.quiz_title: BCOU 501: Managing Stress and Anxiety

questions.question_text: Grief is ____________ that can be caused by any type of loss.

possible_answers.answer_text: a) Understand the loss loved one’s spiritual background
c) Read the client at least 25 Bible verses about how this situation will work together for his/her good
b) Learn the name of the individual who has been lost
d) Tell the client about your story of loss

questions.question_text: Within the first few minutes of your first session with a client struggling with the loss of a loved one, you want to make sure you do which of the following?
What are the kinds of losses that are experienced in childhood?
Loss is an inevitable part of life.
With an ambiguous loss, the person is alive emotionally and psychologically, but they are gone physically.
Which of the following is an abstract loss?
The positives of loss should be shared with clients during the first session they have with you.

possible_answers.answer_text: a) Loss can strengthen our faith

questions.question_text: Which of the following is a positive about loss?

possible_answers.answer_text: a) Normalize what they are experiencing
b) Educate them about what they are going to experience in the future

questions.question_text: When working with those who are struggling with grief, counselors should do which of the following?

possible_answers.answer_text: b) Remembering a time you shared with your loved one

questions.question_text: Which of the following is an example of Face in the Crowd Syndrome?

quizzes.quiz_title: BCOU 502: Grief and Loss

questions.question_text: For serotonin, it is important to have ___________ in your diet. This substance is found in bananas and turkey meat.
ADHD occurs in about ___% of the population.
Most people with _________ have ADHD.
The only approved ADHD medications are mostly stimulants.
One out of 45 people will have a depression that is severe enough that they are psychotic.
Schizoaffective disorder is a combination of __________ and bipolar I disorder.
___________ is a chemical that puts the breaks on our worries.
People cannot be talked out of delusions, but rather have to have ___________ medications.
According to Dr. Meier, all addictions are generally caused by which of the following?
Anorexia has about a ___% death rate and proves to be more dangerous than being overweight.

quizzes.quiz_title: BCOU 503: Psychiatric Care and Medication

possible_answers.answer_text: b) The way we were raised

questions.question_text: Which of the following affects our charitable giving?

possible_answers.answer_text: a) He/she wants to spend money
c) He/she needs to learn to enjoy money
b) He/she tends to not take risks

questions.question_text: What is a weakness of a saver?

possible_answers.answer_text: b) The way they were raised

questions.question_text: Which of the following is a reason for why people view finances the way that they do?
A flyer typically pays the bills as they show up and is very relaxed.

possible_answers.answer_text: a) The Pow-Wow is a one-sided conversation, with only one partner analyzing the financial situation of the household
c) The Pow-Wow allows you to speak on a regular basis without distractions
b) The Pow-Wow should be dreaded because it is an argument

questions.question_text: Which of the following is characteristic of a “Pow-Wow”?
Societal influences never affect the way we view finances.
You should think about a budget like a road map.

possible_answers.answer_text: a) Discuss the issue within 24 hours
b) Hear each side of the story without interruption

questions.question_text: Which of the following should be done if conflicts arise about money?
Which of the following insurances should you consider having?

possible_answers.answer_text: a) After one year of thinking about it
b) To only benefit one partner
d) Only when you have children old enough to go to college

questions.question_text: The budget should be created ____________.

quizzes.quiz_title: BCOU 504: Financial Bondage: Strategies for Freedom

questions.question_text: A person should not react in his/her anger, but rather respond.
According to Dr. Clinton, no matter the problem, anger is usually nestled in the mix of it.
Anger is an emotional response to a __________ wrongdoing or injustice.

possible_answers.answer_text: c) It is one of the most misunderstood concepts in Christianity
b) It is a state of preparedness

questions.question_text: Which of the following is a characteristic of anger?
__________ describes what we do in our anger.
Which of the following is a discussed physical response to anger?

possible_answers.answer_text: b) Acknowledging anger, but stuffing it

questions.question_text: Repression is which of the following?
In Hebrew the word anger means to snort.
Which of the following is a cause of anger?
Righteous anger is about correcting ___________ or ___________.

quizzes.quiz_title: BCOU 505: Anger Management

questions.question_text: Inspiration without ____________ has little value.

possible_answers.answer_text: a) Alive, Living, Inspired, Vigilant, Energetic
c) Always Living In View of Eternity
b) Always Loud In Varying Experiences

questions.question_text: What is the acronym for the ALIVE Principle?
Which of the following biblical characters experienced a perspective adjustment?
Response influences outcome ___% of the time.
Which of the following is essential in the counseling process?
Until the core ingredient of an eternal perspective is addressed, the scope and potential of substantial and significant change in limited.
As counselors, we are working with people who are experiencing the loss of meaningful hope.

possible_answers.answer_text: a) Asking questions prior to meeting with the client
c) Seeing clients back to back in order to maintain a full schedule
b) Researching only after a client has been diagnosed with a mental disorder

questions.question_text: Information involves which of the following?
Stories that carry God’s truth have the greatest potential of lasting a lifetime.
___________ is often the best way to have a “divinely-timed pep-rally” with clients.

quizzes.quiz_title: BCOU 506: The Helping Process: Basic Skills and Practice
